body_html:
If I want to access data in HDFS (remote cluster) that's outside my GPU machine (local), do I still need to install and configure HDFS locally before I can point the file path like:

filename_queue = tf.train.string_input_producer([
    "hdfs://namenode:8020/path/to/file1.csv",
    "hdfs://namonode:8020/path/to/file2.csv",
])
body_text:
If I want to access data in HDFS (remote cluster) that's outside my GPU machine (local), do I still need to install and configure HDFS locally before I can point the file path like:
filename_queue = tf.train.string_input_producer([
    "hdfs://namenode:8020/path/to/file1.csv",
    "hdfs://namonode:8020/path/to/file2.csv",
])
body:
If I want to access data in HDFS (remote cluster) that's outside my GPU machine (local), do I still need to install and configure HDFS locally before I can point the file path like:

```
filename_queue = tf.train.string_input_producer([
    "hdfs://namenode:8020/path/to/file1.csv",
    "hdfs://namonode:8020/path/to/file2.csv",
])
```
